16th April 2015  attended the Wigan v Warrington Rugby League match along with other local Labour party members as the guests of Chorley Group a local business. (I understand the cost of this package would be in the region of £50).

On Friday 6 July I attended Wigan Rugby League for a match vs Warrington with my wife Vanessa.  The tickets were provided by Chorley Nissan, and I would estimate to be in the order of £50 per head.  I attended this alongside other local dignitaries.

I received an invitation from CG Law a local company via their involvement with the Chorley Youth Zone to attend a clay pigeon shooting event at Standish on 23/5/19 with refreshments provided afterwards at the Filling Factory Buckshaw Village.  I subsequently attended the event with various other local business and community leaders in my role as Leader of Chorley Council.  I understand that a reasonable estimate of the attendance of the event & refreshment costs would be in the order of £90 and I understand that these were supplied by CG Law.

On Friday, 16 August I attended the Wigan v Warrington match at the DW Stadium with my wife Vanessa.  We attended as guests of Inspire Youth Zone as part of their contact with potential founders etc. I understand that the package value would be circa £50 per head.

On the 24th February 2023 myself and my wife Vanessa attended the Wigan Warriors Rugby League match along with others as the guests of Chorley Group (Chorley Nissan). This was an opportunity to engage with local businesses and the wider community. The tickets and food supplied is estimated to be in the value of circa £60 per head.
Invitation to Inspire Green Tie Ball - Be Our Guest on Friday 22nd September for myself and Vanesa as guests of the Chair of Inspire.
Attendance at Sefton Business Dinner Partnership 2025 on 11 September paid for by Sovini Group - circa £75.00
